name: Agent Deep Research
description: Autonomous research agent that searches the web, summarizes findings, and generates comprehensive reports on any topic.
description_zh: 自主研究Agent，自动搜索网络、总结发现、生成任意主题的综合研究报告。
author: openclaw-community

name: SEO Audit & Optimizer
description: Comprehensive SEO audit tool that analyzes your website structure, meta tags, content quality, and provides actionable optimization suggestions.
description_zh: 全面的SEO审计工具，分析网站结构、Meta标签、内容质量，提供可操作的优化建议。
author: openclaw-community

name: Douyin Hot Trend
description: Real-time Douyin (TikTok China) trending topics scraper. Get top trending hashtags, videos, and content ideas.
description_zh: 实时抖音热榜抓取工具，获取热门话题、视频和内容灵感。
author: openclaw-community

name: Trend Watcher
description: Multi-platform trend monitoring across Google Trends, Twitter/X, Reddit, and Hacker News. Stay ahead of the curve.
description_zh: 多平台趋势监控，覆盖Google Trends、Twitter/X、Reddit和Hacker News，把握先机。
author: openclaw-community

name: Affiliate Master
description: Strategic affiliate marketing advisor. Analyzes products, suggests optimal affiliate programs, and generates conversion-optimized content.
description_zh: Affiliate营销策略顾问，分析产品、推荐最优联盟计划、生成高转化内容。
author: openclaw-community

name: Mia Content Creator
description: AI-powered content generation pipeline. Creates blog posts, social media content, newsletters, and marketing copy at scale.
description_zh: AI内容生成流水线，批量创建博客文章、社媒内容、Newsletter和营销文案。
author: openclaw-community

name: AI Video Generator
description: Generate short-form videos from text prompts. Supports multiple styles, aspect ratios, and automatic subtitle generation.
description_zh: AI短视频生成工具，支持多种风格、画面比例和自动字幕生成。
author: openclaw-community

name: Autonomous Brain
description: Self-directed task planning and execution engine. Breaks down complex goals into actionable steps and executes them autonomously.
description_zh: 自主任务规划与执行引擎，将复杂目标拆解为可执行步骤并自主完成。
author: openclaw-community
